alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 10:46PM CST until January 13 at 12:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SIGNIFICANT WINTER STORM CONTINUES TO IMPACT THE REGION WITH HEAVY SNOW AND STRONG WINDS THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... .A strengthening low pressure system will track from southern Lake Michigan to Lake Huron by Saturday morning. The strong system will bring heavy snow and strong winds to the region. Most of the region should see total snowfall accumulations between 6 to 20 inches of snow, with the highest amounts across the Door Peninsula. In addition, wind gusts will continue to gust to 45 mph in the Fox Valley, lakeshore, and the bayshore where blizzard conditions are expected into Saturday morning. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Langlade, Florence, Forest, Northern Marinette County, and Northern Oconto County Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Florence; Forest; Langlade; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County
